data.prayer: Father, help the 129,973 believers in Wuhan to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Wuhan, Hubei, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Wuhan, Hubei, China a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Wuhan, Hubei, China to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Wuhan words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Miao, Enshi people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, remind your church in Wuhan, Hubei, China that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Wuhan, Hubei, China, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.section_summary:
the county of Wuhan, Hubei, China has a population of 1,713,300.

We estimate Wuhan has 129,973 people who might know Jesus, 27,678 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,555,649 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Wuhan unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
